name: MustTryIt! Media
tag_list: maine, small-business, local-discovery, tobin-slaven, bootstrapped, main-street
overview:
In a sentence: Discover and vote for the local ‘Must Try’ businesses in your city.

MustTryIt.com - is a mobile website that enables users to browse local ‘musty try’ businesses in their city - vote for the ones they love, and discover new ones they didn’t even know about.

The real benefit is that people get a chance to make a connection with the local small business owners they can trust, so they feel like they’ve got a friend in the business. We want to help make every day be like Small Business Saturday.

By helping connect deserving local businesses with these buy-local-minded people, we believe they are more likely to keep their dollars local when they have a connection and a friend in the business.

Obviously, not every local business qualifies as a “must try” in people’s minds, just like not every team will make the playoffs. It can be hard to know who to trust when you do business locally. We want to fix that. We believe there are six qualities that separate unremarkable businesses from “must try” businesses.

Our mission is to save Main Street, by enabling connections between local shoppers and deserving small businesses. That means helping small businesses become more meaningfully unique, worth talking about, and easier to refer.
